question:
Question: At the initial position, you are asked to navigate to the stairs in front of ALL-STAR Cafe in Central. Is the destination within sight at your current location? If yes, where is the destination in your view?  
choose:  
A. The stairs in front of the central ALL-STAR cafe are currently in the center of my field of view.  
B. The stairs in front of ALL-STAR Cafe in Central are currently in the upper left corner of my field of view.  
C. The stairs in front of ALL-STAR Cafe in Central are not within my field of view.  
D. The stairs in front of ALL-STAR Cafe in Central are currently on the right side of my field of view.  
E. The stairs in front of the central ALL-STAR cafe are currently at the bottom of my field of view.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: C; Reason: The initial position shows a view of the street and buildings, but there are no stairs in front of the ALL-STAR Cafe in Central visible in the field of view. The destination is not within sight at the current location.
textgrad_result.evaluation:
Location: [(0, 4)]
Option: C
Reason: At the initial position (0:00-0:04), the camera shows a wide view of a city street with buildings and trees. The "ALL-STAR Cafe" and its stairs are not visible in this initial field of view. The camera later pans and zooms to reveal the "CENTRAL ALL-STAR" building and its stairs (around 0:43-0:53), but this is not the initial view. Therefore, the destination is not within sight at the current (initial) location. The provided answer is correct.
textgrad_result.final_answer: Option: C; Reason: The initial position shows a view of the street and buildings, but there are no stairs in front of the ALL-STAR Cafe in Central visible in the field of view. The destination is not within sight at the current location.
